meanings.sent1: The delicious smell of cookies permeating the kitchen made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent2: The scent of fresh flowers permeating the room brought a sense of calm.
meanings.sent3: The laughter of the children permeating the air filled the house with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness permeating every interaction, she was loved by all who knew her.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of the sun permeating the skin on a summer day is a delightful feeling.

meanings.sent1: The sunlight shone through the window, permeating the room with brightness.
meanings.sent2: The water flowed permeating through the cracks in the wall, causing a leak.
meanings.sent3: The music played softly, permeating through the walls of the old building.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked bread permeating through the bakery drew in customers.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter permeating through the forest signaled a gathering of friends.
